channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I need to know how to make an item have the option to open bank, such as using one of the options on the item to open an interface giving me the option to click "Open bank" and opening bank interface. Please help and thanks
my server is a 508 source

item.title: Help please

item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

in clickItem packet

under the switch something like

case itemid:
c.getPA().openBank();
break;
